title: App Closes On Pressing Back Button In Manual Setup
body: Please search to check for an existing issue (including closed issues, for which the fix may not have yet been released) before opening a new issue: https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/issues?q=is%3Aissue ### Expected behavior App should go back to the previous page. ### Actual behavior App closes. ### Steps to reproduce 1. While creating new account, click on Manual setup 2. Press back Button 3. App closes ### Environment Android version: API 24 ### GIF:
